localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
blogPost.body: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
blogPost.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid
blogPost.author: Tyler Maran

localize.description: Rysolv 为用户提供了一个分享问题、为开源做贡献并获得报酬的平台。💸任何人都可以创建一个问题或为赏金做出贡献。谁提交了结束问题的解决方案，谁就能获得赏金。
localize.tagline: 修复开源问题，获得报酬

localize.description: Rysolv 爲用戶提供了一個分享問題、爲開源做貢獻並獲得報酬的平臺。💸任何人都可以創建一個問題或爲賞金做出貢獻。誰提交了結束問題的解決方案，誰就能獲得賞金。
localize.tagline: 修復開源問題，獲得報酬

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 55 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续55天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續55天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。

next.excerpt: https://100project.co is the world’s first crowdsourced NFT, a truly collective work of art. Once all pieces are filled, the final artwork will be minted as an NFT, with profits going to the owners of each piece if sold—so buying a piece is also an investment.
next.title: 100 Project - The world's first crowdsourced NFT

localize.description: https://100project.co 是世界上第一个众包的NFT，是一个真正的集体艺术品。一旦所有作品被填满，最终的艺术品将被铸成NFT，如果售出，利润将归每件作品的所有者所有--所以购买一件作品也是一种投资。
https://100project.co 是世界上第一個衆包的NFT，是一個真正的集體藝術品。一旦所有作品被填滿，最終的藝術品將被鑄成NFT，如果售出，利潤將歸每件作品的所有者所有--所以購買一件作品也是一種投資。
